system.requirements:
Tier 1; None
Aptitudes: Willpower, Tech, Unaligned
system.effect:
Character gains +20 to Willpower Tests made to resist mind control or interrogation. They become mildly socially ignorant, such as not getting jokes.
Often provided by a prayer-spewing circuit implanted into the skull.

description.value: Character gains +20 to Willpower Tests made to resist mind control or interrogation. They become mildly socially ignorant, such as not getting jokes. Often provided by a prayer-spewing circuit implanted into the skull.
